home.headline: Daniel Cano
home.subHeadline: ## I craft digital experiences: *Front-end* alchemist at your service
home.technologiesText: I feel comfortable working with **Typescript** and **React** on complex full-stack projects using **Next.js** or for simpler pages using **Astro**. You can see at a sight, some of the technologies I used in the last years just below
home.bannerText: Do you want to take a look to my resumee? Go ahead!
home.timelineText: Graduated in **marketing** and polished as **front-end** developer, this have been my path

metadata.title: Home
metadata.description: Welcome to my portfolio! My name is Daniel and I'm a web development enthusiast with great goals and objectives, and the same motivation and discipline to carry them out. Constant learning and improvement driven by great curiosity.

about.headline: About me
about.text: I am a **history**, **astronomy** and **nature** lover who also loves to travel by **van** with my **dog** (Basajaun) and **discover** new places. Since I was 21 years old I have been moving in different geographical areas and professional fields, which has helped me to know how to get by in different environments and situations. I would define myself as a **cheerful** person, I like to have a **smile** in my face and take things with **humor**

metadata.title: About Me
metadata.description: I am a history, astronomy and nature lover who also loves to travel by van with my dog (Basajaun) and discover new places. Since I was 21 years old I have been moving in different geographical areas and professional fields, which has helped me to know how to get by in different environments and situations. I would define myself as a cheerful person, I like to have a smile in my face and take things with humor

projects.headline: Projects
projects.workProjectsText: In my career I've worked mainly as front-end developer using **Jamstack** or pure **React**, I also love to use **Sass** for the styling and **Cypress** for testing. I've also worked as full-stack using **Node.js/Express** for the back-end and vanilla **JS/Handlebars** for the front-end compiling everything with **Gulp**. Finally I've also work with **Webflow**, some **React Native** apps and **PWAs**
projects.personalProjectsText: In my personal projects, I like to innovate and test my learnings, taking into account principles such as **SOLID**, **DRY**, and **KISS**, as well as **accessibility** and **performance**. Some common technologies I could mention include **Typescript**, **React**, **NextJs**, and testing tools such as **Vitest**, **React Testing Library**, or **Cypress/Playwright**.
projects.404Text: Last but not least, would you like to see an incredible space image of Stephan's Quintet (group of 5 galaxies) taken by JWST and a famous phrase?

metadata.title: Projects
metadata.description: In my career I've worked mainly as front-end developer using Jamstack or just React. I also love to use Sass for the styling and **Cypress** for testing. I've also worked as full-stack using Node.js/Express for the back-end and vanilla JS/Handlebars for the front-end compiling everything with Gulp. Finally I've also work with Webflow some React Native apps and PWAs
